# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# personal settings
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.cache
*.pdb
*.obj
*.log

# Ignore build directories
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/

# Ignore package files
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.dll
*.exe

# Ignore runtime files
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sql
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Ignore environment settings
.env

# Ignore compiled code
*.class

# Ignore generated files
*.g.*
*.generated.*

# Ignore lock files
project.lock.json
package-lock.json

# Ignore IDE-specific settings
.idea/
*.csproj.user

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
~$*
*.bak
